ai-tha-ap46:3.1_0: That great sage who has gone beyond
ai-tha-ap46:3.3_0: The grass and chaff of grass,
ai-tha-ap46:4.2_0: placed on the drinking water and the cream.
ai-tha-ap46:4.3_0: to whom you gave upright ones,
ai-tha-ap46:4.4_0: with a clear and confident heart.
ai-tha-ap46:5.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap46:5.4_0: This is the fruit of that.
ai-tha-ap46:7.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap46:8.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vakkali.
ai-tha-ap46:9.1_0: with senior monks who had been gathered by the senior monks.
